RelatedSentence: This is the 12th year that Priceline.com has published its Memorial Day travel list based on travel bookings made through its website for the upcoming holiday weekend .

AAA , meanwhile , is forecasting the busiest Memorial Day travel weekend since the recession , with 36.1 million Americans traveling 50 miles or more from home , a 1.5 percent increase from last year .

Florida should see about 1.8 million travelers over the holiday weekend .
